summary: An email from an Assistant United States Attorney in the Southern District of New York to unidentified recipients regarding a document found in the Epstein search warrant database with the subject line 'joint defense agreement' and a specific control number, requesting someone to review it.

persons.name: Assistant United States Attorney Southern District of New York
persons.context: Author of the email who is reviewing the Epstein search warrant database and noticed a document with the subject 'joint defense agreement', requesting someone else to look at it.

events.title: Email about Epstein database document
events.description: An Assistant United States Attorney sends an email regarding a document found in the Epstein search warrant database with the subject 'joint defense agreement' and control number USGME00032574, requesting review.
personsInvolved: Assistant United States Attorney Southern District of New York

keyFacts: An email dated August 4, 2021, references the Epstein search warrant database.
A document in the database with control number USGME00032574 has the subject line 'joint defense agreement'.
The email is from an Assistant United States Attorney in the Southern District of New York, requesting someone to review the document.
The email indicates ongoing review of materials related to the Epstein case as of 2021.
